## TestDefinition type

A function defining a new test case or a test suite, e.g. `it` or `describe`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TestDefinition<ARGS extends unknown[], RETVAL> = (name: string, ...args: ARGS) => RETVAL;
```
